title: Task Was Not Done (4C102)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Spell. Regroup: Exert Gandalf to discard up to 2 wounded minions.
Lore:	”'Naked I was sent back - for a brief time, until my task is done. And naked I lay upon the mountain-top.'”
Rarity:	C
